description: The appearance of the point marker when selected. In order to allow a point to be selected, set the series.allowPointSelect option to true.

children.name: enabled
children.description: Enable or disable visible feedback for selection.

children.name: fillColor
children.description: The fill color of the point marker.

children.name: lineColor
children.description: The color of the point marker's outline. When undefined, the series' or point's color is used.

children.name: lineWidth
children.description: The width of the point marker's outline.

children.name: radius
children.description: The radius of the point marker. In hover state, it defaults to the normal state's radius + 2.
